text.p: Let [mathjaxinline]f(x) = 1[/mathjaxinline] and [mathjaxinline]g(x) = x^3[/mathjaxinline]. Using the inner product on the vector space [mathjaxinline]C[0,2][/mathjaxinline] as described in the video, calculate [mathjaxinline]\langle f, g \rangle[/mathjaxinline].

tr.td: [mathjax]\langle f, g \rangle = \int _0^2 f(x) g(x) \ dx = \int _0^2 x^3 \ dx = \left. \frac{x^4}{4} \right|_0^2 = 4.[/mathjax]
